data.caption: Financial Results For The Fourth Quarter And Year Ended March 31St, 2022 - Regulation 33 (3)(A)
data.news_body:
With reference to the subject cited, it is hereby informed that the Board of Directors of the Company at its meeting held on Monday, May 30, 2022 at 5:00 P.M. through video conference facility, interalia, considered and approved the Audited Financial Results (standalone and consolidated) for the quarter and year ended March 31st, 2022.

Copy of Audited Financial Results for the quarter and year ended March 31st, 2022, along with Statement of assets and liabilities and Auditor's Report is enclosed herewith.

data.caption: Announcement under Regulation 30 (LODR)-Earnings Call Transcript
data.news_body:
This is to inform you that Kellton Tech Solutions Limited will hold its 'Earnings Call' on Monday, June 14, 2021, from 04.00 PM IST.

Mr. Niranjan Chintam- Chairman & Whole-time Director, Mr. Karanjit Singh- Chief Executive Officer, India and Srinivas Potluri -Chief Executive Officer, US shall participate from Kellton Tech Solutions Limited to address the investors and analysts through this call.

data.news_body:

Copy of Audited Financial Results for the quarter and year ended March 31st, 2021, along with Statement of assets and liabilities and Auditor's Report is enclosed herewith.
